features: 【Updated Rechargeable Mini Fan】: This battery operated fan with a detachable handle built-in 5200mAh rechargeable battery, which can work as an emergency backup charger. Just press the buttons on two sides of handle to detach it from fan head, then connect it with your mobile phone or other electronics to charge

【Foldable Design】: The 180°foldable handle allow you to adjust this portable fan head to suitable angles you want when put it on desk, and put it in bag easily to carry around with you anywhere you go

【Strong Air Flow】: The unique 3 small fan blades + 3 large fan blades design of this personal fan can help to generate stronger wind but with less noise and more energe saving, the wind is strong as 5 m/s, you can feel the cool breeze from 3 meters away, it's really a lifesaver for hot flashes in hot summer

【Long Lasting Battery】: The built-in 5200mAh rechargeable battery help to offer a long working time from 5 to 20 hours according to Low, Middle or High speed level you choose, and it's easy to charge with any USB-enabled devices, usb socket, PC or car charger, etc

【Versatility Fan】: This small usb fan could work as a desktop fan with foldable handle design,a clip on fan with enclosed metal bracket,a handheld fan with it's ergonomical handle. It's a necessity in hot summer for travel, hiking, shopping, watching sport games, disney land, and more. NOTE: Pls press the buttons on two side of handle to remove the cover first, and then connect the fan head with handle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3 IN 1 Multi-function Portable Handheld Fan Why Choose Us? 1.Multiple Functions When you take it out, you don't need to carry an extra power bank, because it's also a mobile power, you can get your phone charged easily. It's also foldable from 0-180, so you can put it on desk or hang it on the umbrella using clips. buy one and you can gain three useful functions! 2.Long Working Time Many people complain about the short using time of the fan, So we adopt the 5200mAh large capacity Li-on battery, speed 1 last 20 hours; speed 2 last 9 hours; speed 3 last 5 hours, definitely will meet your daily use the most! 3.Super Strong Wind and Ultra-quiet Designed with 6 fan blades, not only can it be ultra-quiet, but also generate strong airflow, cool you down in 2 seconds on hot days. 3 speeds for you to choose, so it's almost suitable for all the age people, from children to adults. 4.Long Durability Using DC Brushless motor, different from the others, it can work continuously for about 20000 hours, which means that you can keep using it till the battery is broken. FAQ: Q:Why can not connect the fan with the battery? A: there is a battery cap in the power bank, which is used for protecting the battery, so please remove it before connecting the fan, and it will work normally. ATTENTION: Please remove the BATTERY CAP before connecting the two pieces.

180° Foldable The fan head can rotate from 0°-180°, you can get cool in the direction you like by adjusting the fan angle, keep cool all the time. 5200mAh Large Capacity Battery With 5200mAh power bank handle design, the fan head can be separated from the power bank, it can be used as a mobile power to charge your phone when your phone need to charge outdoors. very useful! Easy to Carry and Store Portable and foldable design makes it pretty convenient to put in bag. Best choice for you in travel and outdoors.
Handheld Fan Desk Fan Clip on Fan This handheld electric fan also can be used as a clip-on fan, you can clip it on a board or baby stroller via the metal clip.
A must have for the indoors, outdoors activities like Yoga, Pilates, Gym, Travel, Wedding, Shopping, Camping, Party, Disney World, etc.

Easy to Charge The battery powered fan can easy to get charge via PC, power bank, car charger, usb plug or any other usb enabled devices. Product Size Package List 1 x Mini Fan 1 x Power Bank 1 x USB Cable 1 x Metal Clip 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beat the Heat Anywhere with the HandFan 2023 Upgraded Portable Handheld Fan
reviews.reviewText: Staying cool in the scorching heat just got a whole lot easier, thanks to the HandFan 2023 Upgraded 5200mAh Portable Handheld Fan. As someone who's always on the lookout for practical solutions to beat the heat, I'm thoroughly impressed by this foldable personal fan that brings a refreshing breeze wherever I go.From the moment I started using the HandFan, I could tell it's been designed with convenience in mind. Installing it is a breeze – even if you're not tech-savvy. The foldable design makes it incredibly compact, making it a no-brainer to slip into my bag or pocket before heading out. Plus, with its upgraded 5200mAh battery capacity, I can trust that I won't run out of power when I need it most.The fan's handheld design is ergonomic and comfortable to hold, making it ideal for prolonged use. The construction is solid, and the quality is evident in every detail. The combination of functionality and portability truly shines, especially when I'm on the move or enjoying outdoor activities.The fan's performance is where it truly stands out. The airflow is impressive, offering a powerful yet gentle breeze that provides instant relief in hot conditions. Whether I'm out for a stroll, waiting at a bus stop, or lounging at the park, the HandFan has become my trusty companion for staying cool without breaking a sweat.What's particularly notable is the battery life. The 5200mAh capacity lives up to its promise, delivering hours of cooling comfort on a single charge. This is a game-changer for me, as I've experienced many disappointing portable fans that barely last a fraction of the time.The fan's operation is straightforward with intuitive controls. It offers different speed settings to suit various preferences, and I appreciate the quiet operation that doesn't disturb my surroundings – a must when I'm in public spaces.In a nutshell, the HandFan 2023 Upgraded Portable Handheld Fan is a game-changing solution for anyone seeking relief from the heat. Its compact design, powerful performance, long battery life, and user-friendly operation make it a must-have accessory for every summer adventure. Whether you're at the beach, a music festival, or simply walking the dog, this fan will keep you cool and comfortable. Without a doubt, a five-star addition to my summer essentials!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one you're looking for. Buy a few, right away.
reviews.reviewText: I swear before Glob and the witnesses in this website that I have not been paid or coerced in any way to give this testimony. I paid for these fans with my old sweat-and-toil-earned money. So say we all.:BREAKING NEWS EDIT: You probably don't read instruction manuals just like I don't. The new version has a huge feature add. Instead of having to cycle through LOW, MED, HIGH to get to OFF...you can just hold down the button to go straight to off. YUSS!:END EDIT:I've been using these little HandFans for 5 or 6 years now (see old/new in my pic), and thought I just got lucky when my first one turned out to: 1) have long battery life, 2) put out an impressive amount of air, 3) run way more quiet than I expected. The fact that they've improved on the product is fantastic.I don't know what fan magic is going on, but this little fan has harnessed it. One of my V.1s had a little wobble/unevenitude, so I took off the front cover to add a little balance weight. Without that vortex front cover, the fan puts out exactly 0 airs. As in...none. Like most little fans in the world. Add that vortex back on, boom!...sittin' pretty. Try it...you'll be amazed.The new version has some nice improvements. The "recharge your phone!" stuff is interesting, but it's not why you'll want this. It's true, you can charge and it actually does a nice job. See screenshot...it's charging around 1000mA which is respectable, but no where near what your OEM quickcharge version can do. (OnePlus warp charge will do 2x-4x that.) The big payoff about the battery thing is that you can remove the fan and plug it into whatever USB you want. Use your nice Anker battery. Use an USB AC adapter. Whatever. Turns out to be a nice feature.The new version is still quiet, light, and uses the same (exact) fan mech. It's quiet enough on low to use in Church. I just drop the handle in my shirt pocket and angle the fan at my face...so nice. Same with a flight...handle in the seat pocket, angled up to my face. Plenty powerful enough. I haven't found a use for the little clip that comes with it and I never carry it with me, I could maybe you're more clever than I am.I also leave a few of these tucked into the pocket behind the seats in my car. Helps my passengers on hot days when the AC just isn't hitting them right.Anyway, this is the little portable fan you're looking for. Everyone that uses mine goes immediately to Amazam and orders a couple.Note: DO check for any unevenness on the blade, and use prime to send it back for another if it wobbles. It's only happened to me on one fan. The rest (including this new model) have been 100% balanced and perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful and portable
reviews.reviewText: These fans are incredible. Extremely powerful, not too loud, hold a long charge, super portable and compact, and literally the best in any situation where you need cooled off. We take our fans everywhere! Can't tell you how many times we have gone to my grandma's house, where she keeps her thermostat at like 85, and have busted these out and stayed completely cool! Plus, they use the same charger that my android phone uses, so they can be charged from pretty much anywhere (since most people have at least one of those chargers with them or in their homes). I ordered 3 of these and have already convinced multiple people to order them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I needed a fan for our trip to Morocco, Africa. I ended up on this one because of size and reviews. Price was nice too, but I would have paid more if it meant the difference between suffering and being comfortable. Luckily for me, this fan was shockingly effective!! So powerful, nicely made, recharging was quick, and during our two nights in the Sahara Desert, this plugged directly into a USB outlet which allowed me to have it on full blast the whole time, so worked awesome without the battery. On the bus rides, however, this powered through six-eight hour bus rides and only had one to two bars gone. WHAT!?! Battery life is amazing. It doesn’t really hang well, but you can bend this 100 ways so that doesn’t bother me a bit. I tucked it into the handle on the back of the seat and it worked perfect. I also took this on a cruise to have at night and when I dried my hair and this was a necessity. I can’t say enough good things about it. They could easily double the asking price, but it’s a steal. I don’t go anywhere without this thing. I came to add another to my cart. An inexpensive yet effective product still exists? Thankfully, yes! Because sweating is the worst.

Très pratique. Assez puissant mais un peu bruyant sur la vitesse 3.L'apprécie le fait qui peut se détacher de sa batterie vendu avec. ça permet de le brancher sur sa batterie externe plus puissante. Facilement inclinable pour le poser sur son bureau ou même sur son écran d'ordi.Je recommande.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best hand fan and charger ever. Deffo would recommend and repurchase
Pesadito, plegable y muy potente. El ruido es lo normal que te puedes esperar y la batería dura muchísimo.
Ottimo prodotto.. Tre velocità veramente efficace.. In più la batteria si usa anche come caricatore cellulare..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Possibly the best hand-held fan you can buy. The quality is stunning.
reviews.reviewText: I have two other battery powered fans and ordered this one very recently. As soon as I unpacked it I could tell immediately that is was exceptionally well made and had an immediate quality feel to it. It is sturdy, it is well designed, obviously by an expert, and it has all the features you need immediately to hand. I like the blue LED lights showing the state of the battery charge. I like the way the head can be angled for any type of use and I like the power of the fan. My Wife needs one of these fans for medical reasons and she finds that setting number one is more than suffcient for her needs. The size of the product is exactly right. Some other fans are too small to handle confidently. This product is most definitely top of the range in hand held fans. If you purchase one you will not be dissapointed.
